Articles.Content:
Any Topic for modded crafts or SSTOs repository in 1.0.5 ?

I don't find any.....
You can just search in The Spacecraft Exchange for the 'SSTO' and or 'MOD' tag.

That's what I did but it looks like there's only and old one for KSP 0.23

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/40966-the-modded-craft-repository-v023/

Ok, you are right, it's not as easy as I though. I can't seem to search for tags only in the sub-forum (Spacecraft Repostry), only globally. That's a bit messy.

Though searching for the word SSTO limiting it to this subforum feels better.

Edited February 2, 2016 by Evanitis
